description: This template allows you to create a RHEL 7.7 VM running JBoss EAP 7.2 and also deploy a web application called JBoss-EAP on Azure, you can login into the admin console using the JBoss EAP username and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: This template deploys a web application named JBoss-EAP on Azure on a standalone node of JBoss EAP 7.2 running on RHEL 7.7 VM.
